title: Easy Ways to Unblock Cell Phone and Landline Numbers

steps.title: Open the Settings menu .
steps.content: Open the Settings menu . The Settings menu is located on your home screen. It has a gray icon that looks like a gear within a gear. [1] X Research source There are several ways to block a number on a cell phone, including through the iPhone itself or your carrier. You can also block/silence all unknown callers .

steps.title: Scroll down and tap on Phone.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap on Phone . It's next to a green phone icon. You can also tap Messages or FaceTime in the Settings menu if you want to unblock a number from sending text messages or FaceTime invites.

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . This displays a list of all of your blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap Edit in the top-right.
steps.content: Tap Edit in the top-right. This will change the list to edit mode, showing a red delete button next to each blocked number.

steps.title: Tap next to a number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap next to a number you want to unblock. This is the red circle icon with a horizontal line through it.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . It's the red button next to the blocked number. Pressing this confirms that you want to unblock the number.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It has a button-dial icon on a green background. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the More Options button ⋮.
steps.content: Tap the More Options button ⋮ . It has an icon with three vertical dots.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This will open the call settings menu.

steps.title: Tap Block numbers.
steps.content: Tap Block numbers . You’ll see a list of numbers you’ve blocked.

steps.title: Tap the delete icon.
steps.content: Tap the delete icon. This will remove the phone number from your block list. You’ll now be able to receive calls from that number.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It’s the icon with a button-dial phone. [3] X Research source This method applies if you blocked a number through your Android’s phone app. You can also block unknown callers .

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's the icon with three vertical dots in the upper-right of the Phone app. Note: The menu layouts and icons may differ depending on your Android phone's make and model and your wireless carrier. If the icons or menu options are different on your phone, look for a similar option.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's the last option at the bottom of the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Blocked numbers.
steps.content: Tap Blocked numbers . This displays a list of blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap x or - next to a number.
steps.content: Tap x or - next to a number. Depending on the make and model of your phone, you will either be asked to confirm if you want to unblock the number, or it will unblock the number immediately. Depending on the make and model of your phone, an "x" or a "-" icon appears next to each number in the list of blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . This confirms that you want to unblock the number. Any calls you received from the number while it was blocked will not appear in your list of recent calls.

steps.title: Use Family Allowance to unblock numbers.
steps.content: Use Family Allowance to unblock numbers. If your smartphone doesn’t have a built-in number-blocking feature, you may be able to use T-Mobile’s Family Allowances through My T-Mobile. [4] X Research source [5] X Research source You can add Family Allowances for a monthly fee if you’re the Primary Account Holder. This service might be available for purchase through the T-Mobile app, https://t-mobile.com/ , or by contacting T-Mobile.

steps.title: Unblock a number with Family Allowance.
steps.content: Unblock a number with Family Allowance. Here are the steps for unblocking a number with T-Mobile’s Family Allowance service: Go to https://my.t-mobile.com/ to log in to My T-Mobile. Navigate to the Family Allowance section. Go to the Never Allowed numbers option. Find the number you want to unblock and remove it from the list.

steps.title: Go to https://www.verizon.com/ and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.verizon.com/ and log in. If your smartphone doesn’t have a built-in number-blocking feature, you may be able to use Verizon’s blocking service to unblock a number. You’ll log in to your My Verizon account to access the blocking feature. [6] X Research source This method applies if you blocked a number through Verizon. However, blocks this way only last for 90 days. You can also log in using your phone number instead of your User ID.

steps.title: Navigate to Blocks.
steps.content: Navigate to Blocks. You can find this in Account > My plan > Blocks .

steps.title: Click the line you want to unblock numbers for.
steps.content: Click the line you want to unblock numbers for. For example, click your own phone number if you want to unblock a number that you’ve previously blocked.

steps.title: Click Block calls & messages.
steps.content: Click Block calls & messages .

steps.title: Click Deletenext to the number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Click Delete next to the number you want to unblock. It's under the "Currently blocked numbers" section. Deleting a blocked number will allow that number to call you. If you need additional assistance, call Verizon customer service to navigate the issue. If you blocked calls from your phone, see the iPhone, Android, or Samsung methods above.

steps.title: Use the AT&T ActiveArmor app to unblock numbers.
steps.content: Use the AT&T ActiveArmor app to unblock numbers. If your smartphone doesn’t have a built-in number-blocking feature, you may be able to use the ActiveArmor app to unblock a number that you’ve previously blocked. Open the app and navigate to the Personal Block List section. Delete the blocked number that you want to unblock. The number will now be able to call you. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Dial *60 from an AT&T phone.
steps.content: Dial *60 from an AT&T phone. You can use any touch-tone phone with AT&T service. This calls into AT&T's Selective Call Rejection System. On a rotary phone, dial 1160 and follow the prompts.

steps.title: Dial * on the keypad.
steps.content: Dial * on the keypad. This is the menu option to unblock numbers that have been blocked in the Selective Call Rejection System.

steps.title: Dial the number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Dial the number you want to unblock. Use the keypad to enter the 10-digit number you want to unblock.

steps.title: Press # on the keypad.
steps.content: Press # on the keypad. This confirms that you want to unblock the phone number, then unblocks the number from the Selective Call Rejection System. You can now receive calls from that number. If you want to unblock all numbers simply dial *80 or 1180 after you call into the Selective Call Rejection System. If you need additional assistance, call AT&T customer service.
